author: David Slape
description: Sweet and sour with citrus tartness and faint absinthe anise.
name: Paddington
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
15 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: RINSE chilled glass with absinthe and set to one side
STIR marmalade with rum in base of shaker until marmalade is dissolved
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into absinthe-rinsed glass
